results.title: Modulation of Phospholipid Bilayer Properties by Simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Unfortunately, some of the side effects associated with the intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and other lipophilic statins at higher doses include statin-associated @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@ (@DISEASE_Myotoxicity @DISEASE_MESH:D000081030 @@@SAM@@@) and, in more severe cases, @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@kidney failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Teo RD, Tieleman DP. Modulation of Phospholipid Bilayer Properties by Simvastatin. J Phys Chem B. 2021 Aug 5;125(30):8406-8418. PMID: 34296883
citations.BibTeX: @article{34296883, title={Modulation of Phospholipid Bilayer Properties by Simvastatin.}, author={Teo RD and Tieleman DP}, journal={J Phys Chem B}, volume={125}, number={30}, pages={8406-8418}}

results.title: Simvastatin Posttreatment Controls Inflammation and Improves Bacterial Clearance in Experimental Sepsis
results.text_hl: One single administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 6 h after CLP was able to prevent both @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@liver and kidney dysfunction@@@.

citations.NLM: de Jesus Oliveira FM, Gonçalves-de-Albuquerque CF, de Moraes IMM, Reis PA, Rocha VN, Bozza PT, Silva AR, de Castro Faria Neto HC. Simvastatin Posttreatment Controls Inflammation and Improves Bacterial Clearance in Experimental Sepsis Mediators Inflamm. 2020;2020():1839762. PMID: 33110395
citations.BibTeX: @article{33110395, title={Simvastatin Posttreatment Controls Inflammation and Improves Bacterial Clearance in Experimental Sepsis}, author={de Jesus Oliveira FM and Gonçalves-de-Albuquerque CF and de Moraes IMM and Reis PA and Rocha VN and Bozza PT and Silva AR and de Castro Faria Neto HC}, journal={Mediators Inflamm}, volume={2020}, pages={1839762}}

results.title: Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency.
results.text_hl: In our previous studies, we observed that induction of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ with @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@angiotensin II@@@ (@GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@Ang II@@@) combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration results in a high mortality rate or the appearance of signs of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@kidney failure@@@ in @GENE_HMOX1 @GENE_15368 @@@heme oxygenase-1@@@ knockout (@GENE_HMOX1 @GENE_15368 @@@HO-1@@@ KO) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Kopacz A, Klóska D, Cysewski D, Kraszewska I, Przepiórska K, Lenartowicz M, Łoboda A, Grochot-Przęczek A, Nowak W, Józkowicz A, Piechota-Polańczyk A. Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency. Free Radic Biol Med. 2023 Jun 10;205():188-201. PMID: 37302617
citations.BibTeX: @article{37302617, title={Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency.}, author={Kopacz A and Klóska D and Cysewski D and Kraszewska I and Przepiórska K and Lenartowicz M and Łoboda A and Grochot-Przęczek A and Nowak W and Józkowicz A and Piechota-Polańczyk A}, journal={Free Radic Biol Med}, volume={205}, pages={188-201}}

results.title: Renal failure and rhabdomyolysis associated with sitagliptin and simvastatin use.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@Renal failure@@@ and @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ associated with @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ use.

results.title: Gluteal rhabdomyolysis and renal failure due to simvastatin and amiodarone.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@Gluteal rhabdomyolysis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amiodarone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000638 @@@amiodarone@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis.
results.text_hl: At a time of increasing use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and other "statin" drugs for @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering, we report a case of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced acute massive @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal failure@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@primary biliary cirrhosis@@@, occurring 2 years after starting the drug.

citations.NLM: McNaughton H, Mumford CJ, Warlow CP. Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis. Eur J Neurol. 1994 Nov;1(2):175-6. PMID: 24283488
citations.BibTeX: @article{24283488, title={Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis.}, author={McNaughton H and Mumford CJ and Warlow CP}, journal={Eur J Neurol}, volume={1}, number={2}, pages={175-6}}

results.title: Simvastatin: present and future perspectives.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ dose should be adjusted in those receiving CYP3A4 inhibitors, @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@ciclosporin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amiodarone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000638 @@@amiodarone@@@, or in those with severe @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal insufficiency@@@.

citations.NLM: Robinson JG. Simvastatin: present and future perspectives. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2007 Sep;8(13):2159-27. PMID: 17714068
citations.BibTeX: @article{17714068, title={Simvastatin: present and future perspectives.}, author={Robinson JG}, journal={Expert Opin Pharmacother}, volume={8}, number={13}, pages={2159-27}}
